Package RRPSS

Class SalesRevenueDB

Object
SalesRevenueDB
public class SalesRevenueDB extends Object
Sales database used to retrieve, update and store entries of sales made. Stores the sale records into SalesDB.txt file in the database folder. Prints the sale records according to the specified date.
Since:
2021-11-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chua Chong Yih

    private DateTimeFormatter
    formatter
    Format of sale date in this database.
    private static ArrayList<Sales>
    salesList
    List of sale records in this database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SalesRevenueDB()
    Creates a new Sales database and creates a new SalesDB.txt file in the database folder to store the sales entry if one does not exist.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addSales​(Order newSale, int invoiceNumber)
    Creates a new Sales entry with the Order provided and stores in this database.
    void
    getFromSalesFile()
    Reads the SalesDB.txt file and updates this database with the information in the text file.
    void
    printRevenue​(int month)
    Prints all sales on the month specified by the parameter and prints the total revenue generated from all sales from the same month.
    void
    printRevenue​(int day, int month)
    Prints all sales on the day and month specified by the parameter and prints the total revenue generated from all sales from the same day and month.

    Searches this database for a matching invoice number to create a unique entry.

    Writes the list of Sales in this database into the SalesDB.txt file.

  • Field Details

    • salesList

      private static ArrayList<Sales> salesList
      List of sale records in this database.

    • formatter

      private DateTimeFormatter formatter
      Format of sale date in this database.

  • Constructor Details

    • SalesRevenueDB

      public SalesRevenueDB() throws IOException
      Creates a new Sales database and creates a new SalesDB.txt file in the database folder to store the sales entry if one does not exist. Updates the Sales list with the information in the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

  • Method Details

    • getFromSalesFile

      public void getFromSalesFile() throws IOException
      Reads the SalesDB.txt file and updates this database with the information in the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • updateToSalesFile

      public void updateToSalesFile() throws IOException
      Writes the list of Sales in this database into the SalesDB.txt file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • addSales

      public void addSales​(Order newSale, int invoiceNumber)
      Creates a new Sales entry with the Order provided and stores in this database.
      Parameters:
      newSale - the new order that has been confirmed and paid that will be stored in this database.

    • searchInvoice

      public boolean searchInvoice​(int invoiceNumber)
      Searches this database for a matching invoice number to create a unique entry.
      Parameters:
      invoiceNumber - the invoice number to be searched.
      Returns:
      true if invoice number is found and false otherwise.

    • printRevenue

      public void printRevenue​(int month)
      Prints all sales on the month specified by the parameter and prints the total revenue generated from all sales from the same month.
      Parameters:
      month - the month of revenue to be printed.

    • printRevenue

      public void printRevenue​(int day, int month)
      Prints all sales on the day and month specified by the parameter and prints the total revenue generated from all sales from the same day and month.
      Parameters:
      day - the day of revenue to be printed.
      month - the month of revenue to be printed.
